author: pixelzone
long_description:
**"Waystone"**, is inspired by the ["Waystones"](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/waystones) mod, but a little simpler.
The stone is used as a main point of some place you want to return, you can click on the stone holding a scroll to mark the position.. When using the scroll, you return and the scroll will be consumed!

See more **[HERE](https://codeberg.org/pixelzone/waystone/src/branch/main/README.md)** ..

name: waystone
short_description: Adds a waystone that you can return to using a scroll.
title: Waystone
